key_risks: Performance Volatility due to concentrated focus on specific sectors
Limited Diversification due to strict ESG criteria
Regulatory Compliance risks from evolving ESG disclosure requirements
controversies: Greenwashing Concerns regarding the authenticity of ESG claims
environmental_issues: Focus on renewable energy and sustainability, which may be sensitive to market fluctuations
social_issues: Potential scrutiny over ESG screening transparency and rigor
governance_issues: Operational Dependencies on third-party custodians and administrators
